SELECT a.*, m.userId as merchant_id, m.nickName as merchant_name, m.header as merchant_face_img, b.title, b.logo_url, b.price, c.title as language_title, c.logo_url as language_logo_url from shop_goods_order a left join shop_goods b on(a.goods_id=b.id) left join shop_goods_lang c on(b.id=c.goods_id and c.language_id = ${query.languageId}) left join t_user_info m on(b.user_id=m.userId) where 1=1 and a.user_id = #{query.userId}
and a.status=#{query.status}

SELECT a.*, p.title as payment_title, pl.title as language_payment_title, u.nickName as user_name, u.header as user_face_img, b.title, b.logo_url, b.price, c.title as language_title, c.logo_url as language_logo_url from shop_goods_order a left join shop_goods b on(a.goods_id=b.id) left join shop_goods_lang c on(b.id=c.goods_id and c.language_id = ${languageId}) left join t_user_info u on(a.user_id=u.userId) left join shop_payment p on(a.payment_id=p.id) left join shop_payment_lang pl on(p.id=pl.payment_id) where a.order_code = #{orderCode}
